text.name: tc_bakery
text.text: Distribute some bakery products. Please deliver the pallets at the %s.

text.name: tc_flourmission
text.text: A request from the grain mill: Pick up a few pallets, and transport them to the %s.

text.name: tc_fmarketproduce
text.text: Please take some produce from Johnson's Farmers Market to the customer. Deliver the pallets at the %s.

text.name: tc_fmarketseed
text.text: Pick up seed or feed pallets at Johnson's Farmers Market, and deliver them at the %s.

text.name: tc_sawmill
text.text: Pick up a few boards or furniture pallets at the sawmill, and take them to the %s.

text.name: tc_cattle
text.text: The animal dealer has a job for you: Take the pallets from his yard, and deliver them at the %s.

text.name: tc_spinnery
text.text: Request from the spinnery: Load fabrics / clothing pallets there, and deliver them at the %s.

text.name: tc_mall
text.text: The shopping mall called: Load up a few goods there, and deliver them at the %s.

text.name: tc_gasbread
text.text: A call from the gas station: A few pallets have to go to the %s. They are ready at the gas station.

text.name: tc_container
text.text: Pick up a few empty containers here, and take them to the %s.

text.name: tc_bga
text.text: A new order from the biogas plant: Pick up a few pallets there, and deliver them at the %s.

text.name: tc_oilplant
text.text: The oil mill has following request: Pick up products there, and deliver to %s.

text.name: tc_rail
text.text: Request from Elmcreek Rail: Pick up a few pallets at the rail silo, and take them to the %s.

text.name: tc_carpenter
text.text: The carpenter wants to get rid of some pallets in his yard, take them to the %s.

text.name: tc_feed
text.text: Request from Feed & Grain South: Load some pallets there, and deliver them at the %s.

text.name: tc_dairy
text.text: The dairy called: Deliver some of their products at the %s.
